docs.text: Exam 06 github page reference code Pitfalls don't forget FD_ZERO , FD_SET , FD_ISSET . FD_CLR accept() uses sock_fd select() nfds is get_max_fd() + 1 remember receive_msg and broadcast_msg recv <= 0 !!!!!!
